login.title: Sign in to your account
login.linkToLogin: Go back to login page, click here.
login.emailNotVerifiedMessage: Email address is not verified. Please check your email for the verification link, check spam folder also. If you have not received the link, you can resend the verification link from here:

register.title: Create a new account and start learning
register.success: New user created successfully with email address {{email}}. We sent you a confirm link by email (just in case check spam folder), please confirm your email and start learning. Redirecting to login page in {{redirectTimeout}} seconds.
register.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign Up
register.agreeWith: I have read and agree to the
register.cancelSuccessDisplay: If you want to return to the register form, click here

confirm.title: Confirming email address
confirm.success: Your email address confirmation was successful. Redirecting to login page in {{redirectTimeout}} seconds.

resend.resendConfirmDescription: Confirmation failed, please resend the confirmation by entering your email address below.
resend.resendSuccess: New confirmation code sent to email address {{email}}. Redirecting to login page in {{redirectTimeout}} seconds.

forgotPassword.title: Reset account password
forgotPassword.resetDescription: To reset account password, enter the email address you use for the account in the field below.
forgotPassword.successTitle: Password reset link sent succesfully. Please check your email inbox.

resetPassword.title: Set new password
resetPassword.resetDescription: Input the new password and password confirmation below and submit to change the password
resetPassword.successTitle: Password changed succesfully. Redirecting to login page in {{redirectTimeout}} seconds.
resetPassword.failureTitle: Password update failed, please try again.

notFound.title: Oops!
notFound.description: Sorry, page you tried to access not found.
notFound.link: Click to return to the main page

error.title: Oops!
error.description: Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred.
error.link: Click to return to the main page

accountInformation.title: Account information
accountInformation.languageSelectorInfo: This value will be used as a default language for studying. If study material is not available in your language, the default study language will be set to English.

deleteAccount.title: Delete account
deleteAccount.note: Make sure you have taken backup of your account in case you ever need to get access to your data. We will completely wipe your data. There is no way to access your account after this action is executed.
deleteAccount.warning: Warning! This action is irreversible, all your data will be deleted. If you want to continue, enter your password below and click delete.
deleteAccount.modalWarningUpper: After submitting successfully, you will be logged out. Account will be deleted after 30 days of no logging in activity. You can cancel the delete process anytime by logging in to your account before the 30 days is up.
deleteAccount.modalWarningLower: You will receive email confirmation after submitting the form.
deleteAccount.deleteSuccess: Account deletetion process finished successfully. Account will be deleted {{date}}. Login to your account before that to cancel the process.

logout.title: Logout from account
logout.description: Logout current session. Remember to clear cache if you are using public computer or network to access Yomiko

construction.title: Site Under Construction
construction.body1: We are currently in the process of building and designing our new website, and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
construction.body2: We are working hard to bring you a fully functional and user-friendly website as soon as possible. In the meantime, please bear with us as we complete this process.
construction.body3: Please check back soon to see the finished product.
construction.link: Click to return to the main page

kanji.title: N{{jlptLevel}} kanji characters
kanji.description: Learn all N{{jlptLevel}} Kanji characters, {{amount}} decks available for studying.

kana.title: N{{jlptLevel}} kana characters
kana.description: Learn all N{{jlptLevel}} Kana characters, {{amount}} decks available for studying.

vocabulary.title: N{{jlptLevel}} vocabulary
vocabulary.description: Learn all N{{jlptLevel}} vocabulary fun and easy, {{amount}} decks available for studying.

grammar.title: N{{jlptLevel}} grammar
grammar.description: Learn all N{{jlptLevel}} grammar points efficiently, {{amount}} decks available for studying.

view.cancelNextCardButton: Next card in {{count}}, click to cancel

exampleSentence.playButtonDisabled: Example audio is a member feature

reviewFinished.title: All cards reviewed, good work!
reviewFinished.redirectMessage: Redirecting back to deck page in {{count}} seconds
reviewFinished.redirectImmediately: Click link below to go immediately:

tos.title: Terms of Service (available only in english)

bugReport.title: To send a new bug report, please fill all the fields and click send. Thank you!
bugReport.sendSuccess: Thank you for sending bug report! This will help us to provide better experience! You can close this window by clicking close.

settings.title: Check and edit study settings
settings.sendSuccess: Settings updated! You can close this window by clicking close.

radarChart.title: JLPT N{{level}} progress
radarChart.studyTip: You are least performing in {{category}} category, consider doing some extra study.

settings.title: Settings for deck:
settings.favoriteInfo: If you set deck as your favorite, it will be shown on the front page, making access to it faster.
settings.newCardsPerDayInfo: How many new cards do you want to review from this deck every day? Can be set between {{minNewReviews}} - {{maxNewReviews}}
settings.reviewIntervalInfo: Review interval is the maximum time between reviews. Can be set between {{minReviewInterval}} - {{maxReviewInterval}}
settings.reviewsPerDayInfo: How many reviews you want to do every day from this deck? Can be set between {{minLimitReviews}} - {{maxLimitReviews}}

session.sessionWarning: This is the current session on this device. If you delete this one, you will be logged out from this device.

misc.redirectMessage: If page does not redirect automatically,

errors.ERR_ACCEPT_TOS_REQUIRED: Terms of service must be accecpted.
errors.ERR_CHECK_CONNECTION: Something went wrong, check your connection and try again.
errors.ERR_DECK_EMPTY: No cards were available in the requested deck.
errors.ERR_DECK_ID_MISSING_OR_INVALID: Provided deck id invalid or missing, please do not try to access decks via URL field.
errors.ERR_EMAIL_IN_USE: Email address is already in use, select another one.
errors.ERR_MEMBER_FEATURE: This feature is available only to members.
errors.ERR_PASSWORD_CURRENT_AND_NEW_EQUAL: Current and new password cannot be the same.
errors.ERR_PASSWORD_MISMATCH: Password and confirmation do not match.
errors.ERR_USERNAME_IN_USE: Username is already in use, select another one.
errors.ERR_ZERO_OR_NEGATIVE_NUMBER: Value cannot be zero or negative.
